name: Ready 9 / Southern Maryland Seaplanes
about: Ready 9 / Southern Maryland Seaplanes, founded in 2018 by a Navy test pilot instructor, offers specialized flight training and sightseeing flights. Located at St. Maryâ€™s County airport, about 1 hour 30 minutes southeast of Washington, D.C., we provide quality stick-and-rudder training using a 160-hp Piper PA-12 on floats and a Republic Seabee. Our fleet also includes a Cessna 140 for tailwheel instruction. With numerous landing sites around the Patuxent and Potomac Rivers, our float season runs from April to November. We cater to both new and experienced pilots, ensuring a comprehensive and safe flying experience. Contact us to accommodate your training needs and enjoy the scenic beauty of the Chesapeake Bay region.
